mainContent.heading: Consult a Reliable New Jersey Law Firm
mainContent.description: Confide in a trusted law firm in New Jersey. We will review your situation and answer your questions. Then we'll provide legal options tailored to your needs.

seo.metaTitle: Contact Us | Free Consultation | Turuchi Law Firm NJ
seo.metaDescription: Get a free legal consultation. Call 732-210-6410 or visit us at 111 Town Square Pl, Jersey City, NJ. Available for Personal Injury, Immigration & Workers' Comp cases.
